availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Farmer in Hardin County, Kentucky. Kentucky native. Married to Jane E. Shean. Father of Henry C. Shean,James R. Shean, and Alexander C. Shean. Owned thirteen slaves in 1850.

bibl.p: Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, District 3, p. 42; U.S. Federal Census Mortality Schedule, 1850-1855 Ancestry, Hardin County, 1870; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin,District 1, p. 290.
